title: Colors of Change
description: Jake, a teenaged boy from the modern world, is transported to a fantastical land where magic is real, and only he can see it.Adjusting to a new world, and unknown magical abilities, is not easy for Jake; especially when pursued by techno-magical creatures sent by the evil sorcerer that brought him there. Add in confrontations with magic-wielding bullies, wicked school secretaries, and the mysteries of first love, and he just may not survive.Jake is assisted in his quest to find his memories and a way home by his guardian and protector, Sister Faye, his two best friends, and a host of magical beings drawn to his untapped power.Broken Worlds: The Colors of Change is the first book of the Broken Worlds series, a fantasy-adventure story about a teen-aged boy misplaced in time and space with no memory of who he is or where he is from.
author: Mike Ghere
